tweetSweep.name: tweetsweep
tweetSweep.description: web-app created using create-react-app which scrapes twitters api for recent & most interacted with tweets (retweets/likes) using a keyword that you enter. server side in node using twitter client

whosThatPokemon.name: who's that pokémon
whosThatPokemon.description: a pokémon guessing game, created using create-react-app. pokemon figures loaded from pokeapi

roller3D.name: roller 3d
roller3D.description: simple premise of rolling a ball around while collecting cubes to unlock next level. experimenting with unity3d and level creation based on retro video games

galaxy.name: galaxy
galaxy.description: game based on classic galaga, where boss follows you and you must avoid it and shoot it down before it kills you

about.main: more me content: i'm working remotely out of waterloo, ontario
about.par1: i started programming around 10 years ago, in 2012. since i was a kid, i was fascinated by video game develpoment and was always intrigued by games like the legend of zelda, pokemon and super mario
about.par2: video games drew me to the field, however what kept me here was the ability to flesh out any idea or project i wanted to and have the ability to work on industry changing products
about.par3: i'm still a gamer - my pc, switch and i are inseparable...but i also love playing and watching sports, getting bubble tea or sushi with friends and hitting the gym
